pozo.details: POZO is a specialized platform that breaks away from the complex structure of existing delivery platforms by focusing exclusively on 'Pick-up Only' functionality, providing optimized services for both consumers and store owners. The platform was developed with a focus on eliminating delivery fees and time delays while maximizing the efficiency of contactless pickup orders.

ordering.title: Intuitive Pickup Ordering System
items: Store Discovery: Browse nearby pickup-enabled stores via map or list view
Quick Order & Payment: Instant ordering with estimated pickup time, no delivery address required

operations.title: Operational Efficiency System
items: Real-time Notifications: Instant order delivery to store managers with customer status updates
Store Manager App: Order status management (received, preparing, complete) and sales tracking

business.title: Core Business Logic
items: Payment & Settlement: PG integration with automated settlement logic
Refund System: Payment cancellation and refund processing workflow

crou.description: Routine management & spiritual growth companion app for Christians
crou.details: CROU is a hybrid routine management application that supports both spiritual growth for Christian users and general life goal achievement. Users can efficiently manage faith routines like prayer and Bible reading alongside daily goals, staying inspired and consistent through daily Bible verses.

routine.title: Personalized Routine Management
items: Flexible Routine Creation: Manage daily goals like wake-up, exercise, and reading
Christian-Specific Routines: Recommended prayer, quiet time, and Bible reading plans

motivation.title: Motivation System
items: Routine Tracking: Performance scoring with weekly/monthly statistics
Scheduled Push Notifications: Reminders aligned with routine start times

spiritual.title: Spiritual Growth Tools
items: Daily Bible Verses: Fresh verses daily with bookmark and share features
Lock Screen Widget: View today's verse without opening the app

chordly.description: Instagram-style social networking platform for music professionals
chordly.details: Chordly is a next-generation social media app combining Instagram's intuitive user experience with specialized music matching features for professional musicians and music industry professionals. It provides essential networking and opportunities for music activities including ensemble partners, professional tutors, and paid session musician matching, maximizing collaboration efficiency.

matching.title: Professional Matching System
items: Ensemble/Lesson/Session Matching: Detailed filtering by genre, instrument, and skill level
Professional Profiles: Career-focused profiles with instruments and portfolio highlights

social.title: Social Networking
items: Instagram-style Feed: Share photos, videos, and audio clips
Direct Messages (DM): Real-time 1:1 communication and matching coordination

suwon-its-2025.description: Official mobile platform for 2025 Suwon ITS Asia-Pacific Forum
suwon-its-2025.details: An all-in-one mobile platform for participants of the 2025 Suwon ITS Asia-Pacific Forum (ITSAP 2025), designed to maximize the event experience while providing effective networking and information accessibility. Participants can experience personalized schedule management, real-time information access, and active communication through this app.

schedule.title: Event Information & Scheduling
items: Program Guide: Detailed session info, speakers, and abstracts
Personal Schedule: Favorite sessions and personal agenda management

communication.title: Communication & Notifications
items: Participant Networking: 1:1 and group chat features
Real-time Push Notifications: Schedule reminders and urgent announcements

koback.description: All-in-one coaching app for soccer school students, parents, and coaches
koback.details: The KOBACK app is a platform for effective communication and systematic learning management between students (players), parents, and coaches. It supports systematic soccer education by sharing real-time feedback and learning progress.

learning.title: Learning & Progress Management
items: Learning Journal: Coach feedback and video analysis
Progress Tracking: Individual skill development charts and reports

users.title: User-Specific Features
items: Students: Profile management, practice assignment review
Parents: Child's growth records, coach consultation, tuition payment
Coaches: Class and attendance management, feedback uploads
